name: Shoulder Taps
instruction: Start in a plank position, with your wrists under your shoulders and your feet hip-width apart. Touch your left shoulder with your right hand and return to plank position. Touch your right shoulder with your left hand and continue alternating sides until the set is complete.
hints: Tighten your core, engage your glutes, and keep your spine, head and neck aligned. Breathe out as you touch your shoulder with your hand, and maintain your back flat and your hips level with the floor.
